p: Mouse fibroblast cells (L929) and African green monkey kidney cells (Vero) in which the viruses were propagated was from ATCC (American Type Culture Collection). Mouse embryonic fibroblasts (MEFs) were isolated from day 14.5–15.5 embryos. HSV-1 KOS strain was kindly provided by Dr. Sandra K. Weller (University of Conecticut Health Center) and GFP-labeled HSV-1 F stain was kindly provided by Dr. Chunfu Zheng (Soochow University).
